snippet: For the Regent Street Limited Edition Food Safari, which runs through March 15, several restaurants on this shopping thoroughfare -- and two Food Quarters on adjoining streets -- will allow diners to sample small plates from their signature dishes at...
abstract: For the Regent Street Limited Edition Food Safari, which runs through March 15, several restaurants on this shopping thoroughfare -- and two Food Quarters on adjoining streets -- will allow diners to sample small plates from their signature dishes at set prices.

headline.main: Sampling Small Plates on a 'Food Safari' in London
